prev.title: Websites: Viewing the Details of a Website

title: Domains: Managing a Domain
body:
Domains: Managing a Domain¶

????

  1. Click the in the ribbon

  2. Click Websites

  3. Click Domains

  4. Click a domain to view details, an audit trail, and comments

  5. Click DNS to view the

  6. Click to the right of the row and Edit Record to edit the record

  7. Click to the right of the row, Delete Record, and Yes to delete the record

  8. Click in the upper right hand corner and Add Record to add a new record

    • Enter a name

    • Select a type

    • Enter a TTL

    • Enter a value

    • Click Save
